title: 11/25/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/25/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Bruce Arians and Tom Brady are not a good fit

-The media needs to stop complaining about College Football's playoff rankings 

-Colin is starting to wish Tom Brady had retired and gone out on top

-Two NFL teams are doing a masterful job of tanking


Guest: Les Snead, Rams GM

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
